attributes.name: StartDate
attributes.description: The start date of the cycle.

attributes.name: EndDate
attributes.description: The end date of the cycle.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A detailed description of the cycle.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A detailed description of the objective.

attributes.name: Cycle
attributes.description: Reference to the cycle this objective belongs to.

attributes.name: Owner
attributes.description: Reference to the user who owns this objective.

attributes.name: Title
attributes.description: The title of the key result.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A detailed description of the key result.

attributes.name: Objective
attributes.description: Reference to the objective this key result belongs to.

attributes.name: Target
attributes.description: The target value for the key result.

attributes.name: CurrentValue
attributes.description: The current value achieved for the key result.

attributes.name: MeasurementUnit
attributes.description: The unit of measurement for the key result.
